mapper.select: SELECT A.RESULT_START_TIME AS SLEEP_START_TIME -- 측정 시작시간 , A.RESULT_START_DATE AS SLEEP_START_DATE -- 측정 시작일 , A.RESULT_END_TIME AS SLEEP_END_TIME -- 측정 종료시간 , A.RESULT_END_DATE AS SLEEP_END_DATE -- 측정 종료일 , A.SLEEP_TYPE -- 수면 유형 FROM RESULT_SLEEP A WHERE A.ADMISSION_ID = #{admissionId} AND A.RESULT_START_DATE BETWEEN DATE (#{resultStartDateTime}) AND DATE (#{resultEndDateTime})
